RatingRequest.name: RatingRequest
RatingRequest.description: Represents the common run-time parameters, such as context definition and rating procedure for a set of records in the rateable summary table.

ContextDefinition.description: Context definition that's used for context instance creation, which encapsulates all aggregated records that are stamped for the rating request.

ContextMapping.description: Context mapping that's used for context instance creation, which encapsulates all aggregated records that are stamped for the rating request. If no ID is provided, default context mapping is used.

DoesExcludeWaterfall.description: Indicates whether the waterfall isn't generated for the rating request (true) or is generated (false). The default value is false. Available in API version 64.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last referred to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

Name.description: Auto-generated identifier for the rating request record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the record.

RatingProcedureName.description: Procedure name that's used to rate the aggregated records that are stamped for rating request.
